name: Axoni
headline: Axoni is building the next generation of capital markets technology
description: Axoni is a New York-based technology firm that builds multi-party workflows and infrastructure for some of the largest financial institutions in the world. Founded in 2013, the company offers core data infrastructure, application development, and automation tools.

founders.name: Greg Schvey, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Greg is a repeat entrepreneur and drives Axoni’s strategic execution. He previously co-founded TradeBlock and worked as a fixed income analyst at Citigroup. Greg holds a bachelor’s degree from Cornell University where he studied finance.

founders.name: Jeffrey Schvey, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Jeff oversees all technology at Axoni. He previously co-founded TradeBlock and worked as the Engineering Lead in Raytheon’s strategy group. Jeff holds a master’s degree in engineering from Cornell University.

Axoni’s HYDRA platform delivers real-time, automated replication of data between institutions, reducing reconciliations, data pipeline management cost, and unnecessary risk.

**Axoni: Pioneering Capital Markets Technology**

Founded in 2013 and rooted in New York, Axoni is carving out a niche in the capital markets technology landscape. With a team of 155 dedicated professionals, they collaborate closely with some of the world's largest financial institutions, delivering robust solutions that streamline complex multi-party workflows.

**Mission and Focus**
At its core, Axoni is on a mission to create the next generation of capital markets technology. Their flagship platform, HYDRA, enables real-time and automated data replication between institutions, significantly minimizing the costs and risks associated with data management. This means fewer reconciliations and a smoother workflow for financial operations—a win-win for all parties involved.

**Recognition and Credentials**
Having initially emerged from the Y Combinator Batch W14, Axoni's innovative approach hasn’t gone unnoticed. They've been recognized multiple times, including accolades such as "OpRisk Innovation of the Year" and being named one of Forbes' Fintech 50. Their commitment to security and compliance is highlighted by obtaining SOC 2 Type 2 certification, reinforcing trust in their services.

**Team and Culture**
The Axoni team is a fusion of engineering talent and financial expertise, deeply invested in pushing the boundaries of what's possible in fintech. They prioritize values like enthusiasm, integrity, and performance, ensuring that they not only deliver on their promises to clients but also foster a supportive environment for their colleagues.

**Join Them in Their Journey**
If you’re curious about pioneering technology that’s reshaping capital markets, check out their offerings [here](https://axoni.com) or explore opportunities to join their dynamic team on their [careers page](https://axoni.com/careers).

In short, Axoni is not just building technology; they're building the future of capital markets—efficient, reliable, and ready for whatever comes next.
